reviews.review: With a smart friend, it's the best.
My friend won't play with me :(
Eğer hala almadıysanız ve arkadaşınızla iyi vakit geçirmek istiyorsanz 1,50 tl'ye alabilirsiniz hatta arkadaşınızın paarası yoksa benim gibi hediye bile edebilirsiniz.Tabii arkadışınız mal değilse
以为7块史低的我太天真了。。
钢结构焊接和顾客更何况工会经费那天
Старая, добрая портал 2, люблю, уважаю, а за 25 рублей купить ее для меня честь

I love portal 2 the game itself is really cool I liked the idea that players can create their own tests to have fun I also love the co-op mode and very cool the idea of playing with friends that makes the game much cooler
I love Portal and Portal 2.  I got both on discount, but I think I might actually pay full price for Portal 3 if we ever see it come out.
没什么好说的 总之游戏好玩就行
This game series can really tingle your brain. Great game!

This is one of those games you play and it's so good, and you get really into it for a while and play it all the time, and then eventually stop playing and forget about it for a while longer. Then something reminds you of it and you go, " oh man, I wanna play some Portal 2", and then you do, and its still super fun.

I finished co-op with a friend first and I'd recommend playing with someone enjoys puzzles and has good communication. I played this for the second time today and found myself laughing, empathizing and seeing things I'd missed before. Amazing voice acting, solid game.
好玩，创意工坊很多图。3块的游戏，值
Many years too late. Very good game, still worth playing. The Co-op maps are a blast with a friend, definitely recommend when you clear the game.
神ゲー以外の何物でもない。

O jogo tem uma história interessante, mecânicas legais e etc. 
Recomendo.

9.5 / 10 ：我得去找个有字幕的版本再通关一遍。

游戏性非常棒。提供了大量烧脑但是又绝对能够巧妙通过的关卡，稍微耐心一点甚至能0攻略通关。
但是玩起来头晕也是真的，尤其是当你在传送门之间连续穿梭的时候（大概是因为我们现实中并不会出现传送门这样的空间联系？）。另一方面，恐高也可能会是阻碍你游戏的一个原因。
顶级音乐，顶级故事，紧张刺激，但是考脑子不考手。
正版...就当听力练习吧。对话也有点快，对于非英语母语者而言可能造成理解困难，但对通关的影响不大。（19-8-10更新:原版附带了中文字幕，在音频相关的设置里，不在显示设置里。可能是把字幕当作了对于听障者的辅助功能）

3块钱神作，买什么，愣着啊！
Gostei do jogo, bons graficos, estrategia, divertido, recomendo experimentar....
补票经典，还有一件事：什么时候数三啊？
Awesome game. Like portal 1, but with multiplayer and more emotion.

Forgot how good these portal games were, recently reinstalled for a bash at the co-op mode, yeah its looking a little dated now but its still one of the best fps puzzlers ever to hit the p. If you not tried portal before buy the set and enjoy,,,,one of those games that you just have to do one more level,,and another,,and another,,,,
끌우루루루룰 잼 인생 살면서 꼭 해봐야 하는 게임중 하나라고 생각함
buen juego se los recomiendo para pasar el tiempo pero tambien les recomiendo comprar el pack con portal y portal 2
超级烧脑的游戏，有很多不同的套路，不过玩到后面就大概知道套路是什么了~真的挺好玩， 推荐!
文句なしの素晴らしいゲーム
Mesmo sendo um jogo "antigo" ainda traz um grande diversão(principalmente com amigos)

10/10
Прохождение игры затягивает в свой вихрь и не можешь не проходить все испытания.
Браво валя, в течении 7 лет игра не отстает от рейтинга.
Great game to play with friends if you like hamburgers
the gateau most definitely contains a false statement
Good game I just want summer sale points tbh
这是一款轻松休闲的动脑小游戏，买下来和同学玩了一晚上，充满了互相嘲讽的挑逗。总体来说双人模式很好玩呀，单人模式我玩了几关，感觉过于简单，不像双人那么有意思和烧脑
joguei com meu amigo cabrao e a gente foi enganado pela vaca la '-'
One of my all time favourites

My first (purchased) game on Steam, this was a really enjoyable game to experience despite some puzzles that were difficult throughout the gameplay. I'm not a puzzle-solving type of person, but walking through this entire game with Wheatley and GLaDOS had some funny and interesting moments that made this game worth puzzle solving. The idea of the dual portals will really take you to a lot of places in this game, and if you are a puzzle-solving person, then I think Portal 2 is the right game for you.
Güzel bir oyun co-op zevkli geçiyor

I finally got around to playing this game and I found many things I like about it. It contains many puzzles, but the best part is all the robotic sarcasm... along with the story plot. Very fun game to play!
This is by far one of my favorite games. It has a great story, challenging puzzles, is replayable, and has an amazing fan base keeping the game alive.

Sehr gutes Spiel von der Story her die Grafik ist für das alter auch noch vollkommen OK nur die Ladebildschirme sind etwas lang ( jeden falls mit einer HDD ) aber dies ist nur ein ganz kleiner nachteil und auch der einzige  denn die Story ist einfach einzigartig !
A possibility to give your friend high fives in-game? You don't even have to go out anymore.

Portal 2 é simplesmente um jogo incrível de puzzle, assim como seu jogo anterior, expandindo muito mais o universo de Portal, com novos personagens e mais sobre a histório do jogo, e fechando a saga de uma maneira incrível. O jogo também possue um modo multiplayer coop muito divertido e que funciona muito bem. Preciso dizer que esse é um dos meus jogos favoritos e que vale cada centavo, se você gosta de jogos desse tipo.
Très bon jeu: un scénario de solo très bien écris, des images magnifiques et des speed actions parfaites
Sin duda uno de los mejores juegos que jugué en mi vida
Very highly recommend to anyone who enjoys a difficult puzzle game.
Excellent voice acting and fun riddles.
SUPER FUN i definitaly recomend buying
I am ever impressed by the portal mechanics.
